## PathBDTO class

Backend DTO for path. Based on [PathModel](./clm-core.pathmodel.md) The instance [pathBDTOInstance](./clm-core.pathbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PathBDTO extends BaseBackendDTO<PathModel> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseBackendDTO](./clm-core.basebackenddto.md)<!-- -->&lt;[PathModel](./clm-core.pathmodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [registerRoutes(app, ECLUDED\_PATHS)](./clm-core.pathbdto.registerroutes.md) |  | Persists all existing routes of the express app in the database |
